common_oarchive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_COMMON_OARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_COMMON_OARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008

00019 #include <boost/archive/detail/basic_oarchive.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/archive/detail/interface_oarchive.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/archive/detail/oserializer.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/archive/detail/register_archive.hpp>
00023 
00024 namespace boost {
00025 namespace archive {
00026 namespace detail {
00027 
00028 // note: referred to as Curiously Recurring Template Patter (CRTP)
00029 template<class Archive>
00030 class common_oarchive : 
00031     public basic_oarchive,
00032     public interface_oarchive<Archive>
00033 {
00034     friend class interface_oarchive<Archive>;
00035 private:
00036     virtual void vsave(const version_type t){
00037         * this->This() << t;
00038     }
00039     virtual void vsave(const object_id_type t){
00040         * this->This() << t;
00041     }
00042     virtual void vsave(const object_reference_type t){
00043         * this->This() << t;
00044     }
00045     virtual void vsave(const class_id_type t){
00046         * this->This() << t;
00047     }
00048     virtual void vsave(const class_id_reference_type t){
00049         * this->This() << t;
00050     }
00051     virtual void vsave(const class_id_optional_type t){
00052         * this->This() << t;
00053     }
00054     virtual void vsave(const class_name_type & t){
00055         * this->This() << t;
00056     }
00057     virtual void vsave(const tracking_type t){
00058         * this->This() << t;
00059     }
00060 protected:
00061     // default processing - invoke serialization library
00062     template<class T>
00063     void save_override(T & t, BOOST_PFTO int){
00064         archive::save(* this->This(), t);
00065     }
00066     void save_start(const char * /*name*/){}
00067     void save_end(const char * /*name*/){}
00068     common_oarchive(unsigned int flags = 0) : 
00069         basic_oarchive(flags),
00070         interface_oarchive<Archive>()
00071     {}
00072 };
00073 
00074 } // namespace detail
00075 } // namespace archive
00076 } // namespace boost
00077 
00078 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_COMMON_OARCHIVE_HPP
